sentences.sentence: To all my friends and relatives, to all colleagues: I am giving up on everything and eloping with Wang Qin.
sentences.translation: 各位亲友，各位同事，我放弃一切，和王琴私奔了。

sentences.sentence: Such sentiments have long motivated eloping young couples as they seek to be together, despite parental objections.
sentences.translation: 长久以来，年轻情侣们常被这种观点所驱使，为了能在一起，不顾家人反对，选择私奔。
